articles.title: Russia to work on solo Mars mission after Europe freezes joint project - Interfax - CNA
articles.description: Russia will start work on its own Mars mission given that the European Space Agency (ESA) has suspended a joint project in the wake of the Ukraine invasion, Interfax news agency quoted a top official as saying on Friday.The ESA announced on Thursday that it w…

articles.title: ESO Reveals New Photo of a Grand Design Spiral Galaxy Snapped by the Very Large Telescope - iTech Post
articles.description: The ESO has released a new photo of the spiral galaxy Messier 99 taken by the Very Large Telescope. The European Southern Observatory (ESO) has released a new photo snapped by the Very Large Telescope.
articles.content:
The European Southern Observatory (ESO) has released a new photo snapped by the Very Large Telescope. The photo features the NGC 4254, which is otherwise known as Messier 99.

articles.author: Shivali Best
articles.title: NASA's James Webb Space Telescope is photographed 620,000 miles away - Daily Mail
articles.description: The European Space Agency's Gaia and NASA's James Webb are both currently orbiting the Lagranage point 2 (L2), roughly one million miles from Earth.
articles.content:
The European Space Agency's (ESA's) Gaia space observatory has shared a stunning photo of NASA's James Webb Space Telescope.
The two telescopes are both currently orbiting the Lagranage point 2 (L2)… [+6416 chars]
